name: Fingers Crossed
description:
Fingers Crossed is a Rock/Paper/Scissors game with a twist. Each time someone loose, one of its fingers is cut. You'll have to defeat 4 opponents in a row without loosing your 5 fingers.

Features:

  • Classic Rock/Paper/Scissors rules
  • 4 opponents with their own way to play against you, use this to your advantage!

Controls:

  • Mouse to play
  • Press "Escape" to quit
